help.title: Record Date
help.body: The record date can generally be found in the upper left hand corner of the record. Enter it as written, e.g. "1867 May 11"

help.title: Mortgager Name
help.body: The Mortgager is often found at the top of the list of hand-entered data. The mortgager tends to be a single person's name. If multiple names are given, enter them all separated by semi-colons.

help.title: Street Address
help.body: The building address is sometimes labeled "No. of Street or Avenue". When possible, try to interpret the address given using contemporary address conventions. For example, for "No. 39 Mott St" enter "39 Mott St"

help.title: Valuatation
help.body: Sometimes records include individual, dated Valuations of the property and/or building. If any exist in this record, note the most recent.

em_transcribe_valuation.instruction: Enter the last property valuation that was recorded, if any

help.title: Amount Loaned
help.body: The Amount Loaned is typically found at or near the bottom of the record. For example, for "Amoun Loaned: $4,500.", enter "4500".
